Help.Title: Help us protect you from fraudsters
Help.Subtitle: At Yo'ldosh, we do everything to ensure your trips are safe. But sometimes scammers try to take advantage of users' trust.

Protect.Title: To protect yourself:
Protect.1: Communicate and pay for trips only through the Yo'ldosh app.
Protect.2: Do not share SMS codes, PINs, or bank card information with anyone.
Protect.3: Check driver and passenger ratings and reviews.
Protect.4: If you notice anything suspicious, report it to us and we will deal with it immediately.

Help.BeCareful: Be careful, and every trip with Yo'ldosh will be calm and reliable.

Travel.Title: Travel more conveniently with the app Yo'ldosh
Travel.Description: Install the Yo'ldosh mobile app to find passengers. With it, you will always be up to date on your trips. Chat with passengers, receive ride reminders, view purchased bus tickets, and use other useful features right on your smartphone
Travel.Subtitle: With the Yo'ldosh app, your trip history is always at hand!
